synopsis.text: Set in 1960s Tokyo, "Anime Title" tells the story of Shin, a poor yet happy boy who loses his mother, his only family. In his darkest moments, Shin is saved by Itsuki, a boy who has also lost a sister. The two, along with Tae, a girl who can see spirits, form a close bond. Together with Shin's guardian spirit Suu-san, a nekomata cat, and other friendly yokai, the makeshift family works to uncover a mysterious incident related to the loss of their loved ones. Through this shared trauma, the ragtag group discovers the true meaning of family. However, their ordeal is not over, as a shocking truth still awaits them. This origin story for the ruler of the spirit world, Lord Enma, interweaves tales of friendship and perseverance in the face of adversity. With elements of fantasy and the supernatural, "Anime Title" promises to be an engaging anime that explores profound themes.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
